intro: Gulubia longispatha, commonly known as the long-spurred gulubia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. The plant features lance-shaped leaves with a smooth surface and produces elongated, spurred petals that aid in pollination by attracting specific insect pollinators.
